doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 9/29/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 9/29/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Chicago passenger sues American Airlines for exposing her to AIDS when an employee bit her after an altercation2. Evangelical Women's Caucus International approves resolution endorsing civil rights protection for homosexuals3. ACLU declares the New Orleans ordinance banning cross-dressing and lewd behavior unconstitutionalCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp4. Man accused of murdering wife after she called him gay5. Andy Humm on radio host Bob Grant spreading hatred against gays6. Ferrysburg, Michigan wants to change town name due to teasing over connotation of "fairies"COMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine7. Newman's Own company includes American Foundation for AIDS Research in its list of charities8. AZT approved for use in the United States, for certain cases of AIDS9. Psych study finds gays as anxious about growing old as straight men, eroding the "old queen" stereotype10. Reading viewer donation lettersCOMMERCIAL: Gay Cable Network fundraiser11. Sports Report, interview with Joe Franco about "Gayrobics"COMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation with Jose Sarria12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Coverage of "With the Greatest of Ease" gay band conventionCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. Mystic Fire video, clips of Paul Bowles interview3. Clips from AZT news conference, coverage from CNN4. TV show Superior Court deals with AIDS controversyCOMMERCIAL: Gay Cable Network fundraiser5. Interview with proponent of alternative AIDS therapy using Vitamin C injections6. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 9/29/1986]: September 1986
